content: the simple stitches hat is a versatile easy-to-make crochet hat pattern available in 11 sizes from baby to adult crocheted in one piece from the bottom up using simple stitches this pattern works well as a regular beanie or can be adjusted for a slouchy style designed with worsted weight yarn and a 5 5 mm crochet hook this hat is a quick and easy crochet project to make **join the cal newsletter here ** https //oombawkadesigncrochet ck page/0fde95d68d this is just one of the patterns included in our september hat of the month club collection > this pattern will be available as a > free pdf download until september 23 > 2024 at 11 59 pm est new york time > 23 59 for cal participants simply > add the pattern to your cart before > 11 59 pm est on september 23rd and it > will show as $0 00 the free pattern will be available on my blog beginning on september 22 2024 at 8 00 pm est new york time 20 00 grab the free pattern from my website or purchase the ad-free pdf right here on ravelry > this pattern is available for free on > my website which is monetized by ads > if you prefer an ad-free version of > the pattern it is available to > purchase from my pattern shop ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ tiktok https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2024 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
